shortDescription: The vCenter Server contains a privilege escalation vulnerability.Â A malicious actor with network access to vCenter Server may trigger this vulnerability to escalate privileges to root by sending a specially crafted network packet.
vulnerabilityName: VMware vcenter_server Improper Check for Dropped Privileges
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
